topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55b0466b63687254e2001227#post_55b0466b63687254e2001227
The video relates that times when you are texting loooong walls of texts expressing your love towards your girlfriend/boyfriend, with only receiving a simple "ok" from your love one as an answer to your long love poem that you dedicated to him/her, in the end THROWING ALL OF THAT TO HELL!
